readable.title: 792362827_5ab5281b99
readable.content: A group of young blond children , one carrying a rifle , poses in front of a house . Five children are standing in front of a wooden hut . five kids posing for a picture one is holding a gun Four brothers and one sister posing for a picture , smiling . There are five kids standing next to each other , and the one in the red has a gun .
